metadata.name: JorrDaar Event Pass #1
metadata.description: This token is a verifiable NFT ticket for admission to JorrDaar Event by JorrParivar on 24th June 2022, which is Indiaâ€™s 1st NFT ticketed IRL Event based on REAL NFT TICKETS airdropped based on a snapshot of JorrParivar hodlers on Ethereum Blockchain.
